article_title: Free Speech Coalition calls for porn productions to shut down amid coronavirus
article_description: The Free Speech Coalition  FSC  is calling for an immediate  voluntary shutdown of adult productions to help mitigate the spread of the coronavirus  The last time the industry shutdown was when a performer tested positive for HIV in 2018  according to FSC and
